greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The smallest k such that Fibonacci(n)+k and Fibonacci(n)-k are both prime.
comment: Indices where a(n)= 0 are provided by A001605.
maple: A047160 := proc(n) for k from 0 to n-1 do if isprime(n-k) and isprime(n+k) then return k; end if; end do: return -1 ; end proc:
A177461 := proc(n) A047160(combinat[fibonacci](n)) ; end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 23 2011
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k}, If[n==2||OddQ[n], k=0, k=1]; While[!PrimeQ[n-k] || !PrimeQ[n+k], k+=2]; k]; Table[f[Fibonacci[n]], {n,3,100}]
results.author: _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, May 09 2010
